description:
This session introduces how to analyze financial data using Natural Language Processing (NLP). Through real-world case studies, it shares how Python and AI techniques can be applied to extract insights from financial datasets.

Daehyun Kim
Speaker at PyCon Korea 2024, sharing experiences in applying AI and NLP to financial data analysis.

related_urls.label: Analyzing Financial Data with AI and Python using NLP

title: Analyzing Financial Data with AI and Python using NLP
